events.title: 2nd Annual Bingo Bash
events.description: Our Second Annual Bingo Bash is Aggies for Limbs' annual food event for the spring! A food event is held every April near Texas A&M University's campus and is open to all families. This event is a fun gathering where BBQ will be served, several bingo rounds will be played, and prizes will be given to winners. 100% of the proceeds will be given to Ashton's Angels.
